articles.author: Tracy Swartz
articles.title: Strokes are common — here’s how to prevent most of them - New York Post
articles.description: More than 600,000 Americans are expected to experience their first stroke this year — but up to 80% of these incidents may be preventable.
articles.content:
More than 600,000 Americans are expected to experience their first stroke this year but up to 80% of these incidents may be preventable.
